p: An integrated panel of microbial agents in a 96-well plate was adopted from Cos et al. [ 42], including Gram-negative Escherichia coli (ATCC8739), Gram-positive Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC6538), yeast Candida albicans (B59630), and protozoa Plasmodium falciparum (Ghana), Trypanosoma brucei brucei (Squib-427), T. cruzi (Tulahuen CL2), L. infantum (MHOM/MA(BE)/67) and Leishmania amazonensis (MHOM/77BR/LTB0016).
